sentences.english: Of course, simply the accusation Watermelon unethical to no avail.
sentences.chinese: 當然，單純的指責瓜農缺德無濟於事。

sentences.english: Some boys went to steal water melons but the farmer set this dog on them.
sentences.chinese: 幾個男孩去偷西瓜，瓜農卻放狗咬他們。

sentences.english: Watermelons bought directly from the farmers are delicious as well as cheap.
sentences.chinese: 從瓜農手中直接買的西瓜又好喫又便宜。
